data.author: amyjchen

changelog.release_notes:
First version of Vibes.

The minutes are expressed with four vibrations, three of short and one long. The placement of the long vibration signals the minutes. The minutes are followed by a long pause and then vibrations of equal length, one for each hour: 

So if the time is 3:45, it's signaled as follows: short, short, short, long, pause. one, two, three. 

THE MINUTES ARE AS FOLLOWS: 
 XX:00  long, short, short, short. 
 XX:15  short, long, short, short. 
 XX:30  short, short, long, short. 
 XX:45  short, short, short, long. 

The hours are based on a 12-hour clock. 

The current version of the watchface starts at 8:00 am and ends at midnight.

The minutes are followed by a long pause and then vibrations of equal length, one for each hour. So if the time is 3:45, it's signaled as follows: short, short, short, long, pause. one, two, three. THE MINUTES ARE AS FOLLOWS: XX:00 : long, short, short, short; XX:15 : short, long, short, short; XX:30 : short, short, long, short; XX:45 : short, short, short, long. The hours are based on a 12-hour clock. The current version of the watchface starts at 8:00 am and ends at midnight.
